p: Fungal infection can be very dangerous for humans, producing mycotoxins and reducing or destroying the nutritive value of foodstuffs, grains, and leaves during storage. Numerous EOs and their constituents have been investigated for their antimicrobial properties against different fungi [ 4]. Antifungal activity is estimated in terms of growth inhibition, and the order of activity is phenols > cinnamic aldehydes > alcohols > aldehydes > ketones > ethers > hydrocarbons [ 20].
